Rochester_Hills.Stony Creek Metropark:
Stony Creek Metropark is a Huron-Clinton Metropark located in southeast Michigan in the outskirts of metro Detroit. The park is predominantly in Washington Township, MI and Rochester/Oakland, MI, with a small portion in Shelby Township, MI. The park covers 4,461 acres (18.05 km2) with Stony Creek Lake at its center.


== Geography ==
Stony Creek Lake is a man-made lake built by damming Stony Creek, a tributary of the Clinton River.
